abstract: The emergency cost-cutting program announced last week will also include possibly shorter workweeks and reductions in executive compensation.
snippet: The emergency cost-cutting program announced last week will also include possibly shorter workweeks and reductions in executive compensation.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  Toyota Motor said on Thursday that buyouts for factory workers, possibly shorter workweeks and reductions in executive compensation would be part of an emergency cost-cutting program it announced last week.

headline.main: Toyota’s Cost-Cutting Plan to Include Buyouts for Factory Workers
headline.print_headline: Toyota’s Cost-Cutting Plan to Include Buyouts for Factory Workers
